languages.text: "С этого момента аколитам будет оказана всяческая помощь в их поисках".

traits.locale_text: "С этого момента аколитам будет оказана всяческая помощь в их поисках".

languages.text: "From this moment, the acolytes shall receive all possible assistance in their investigation."
languages.original_text: "С этого момента аколитам будет оказана всяческая помощь в их поисках".

traits.locale_text: "From this moment, the acolytes shall receive all possible assistance in their investigation."
"From this moment, the acolytes shall receive all possible assistance in their investigation."
"From this moment, the acolytes shall receive all possible assistance in their investigation."
"From this moment, the acolytes shall receive all possible assistance in their investigation."
"From this moment, the acolytes shall receive all possible assistance in their investigation."

languages.text: "Şu andan itibaren havarilere, soruşturmalarında mümkün olan her türlü yardım sunulacak."
languages.original_text: "From this moment, the acolytes shall receive all possible assistance in their investigation."

traits.locale_text: "Şu andan itibaren havarilere, soruşturmalarında mümkün olan her türlü yardım sunulacak."

languages.text: « À partir de maintenant, nous ferons tout notre possible pour assister les acolytes dans leur enquête. »
languages.original_text: "From this moment, the acolytes shall receive all possible assistance in their investigation."

traits.locale_text: « À partir de maintenant, nous ferons tout notre possible pour assister les acolytes dans leur enquête. »

languages.text: 「この瞬間より、アコライトたちはその調査において可能な限りあらゆる支援を受けるものとする」
languages.original_text: "From this moment, the acolytes shall receive all possible assistance in their investigation."

traits.locale_text: 「この瞬間より、アコライトたちはその調査において可能な限りあらゆる支援を受けるものとする」

languages.text: “从现在开始，我们要为那些审判庭的侍仆提供一切必要援助，协助他们进行调查工作。”
languages.original_text: "From this moment, the acolytes shall receive all possible assistance in their investigation."

traits.locale_text: “从现在开始，我们要为那些审判庭的侍仆提供一切必要援助，协助他们进行调查工作。”

languages.text: «Desde este momento, los acólitos recibirán toda la ayuda posible para su investigación».
languages.original_text: "From this moment, the acolytes shall receive all possible assistance in their investigation."

traits.locale_text: «Desde este momento, los acólitos recibirán toda la ayuda posible para su investigación».

languages.text: "Von diesem Moment an erhalten die Akolythen für ihre Untersuchung jede erdenkliche Unterstützung."
languages.original_text: "From this moment, the acolytes shall receive all possible assistance in their investigation."

traits.locale_text: "Von diesem Moment an erhalten die Akolythen für ihre Untersuchung jede erdenkliche Unterstützung."
